structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Statewide Educational Technology Plan; Goals; Development And Implementation

text.section: the implementation and integration of technology into teaching and learning in public schools, including, but not limited to, the establishment of a statewide telecommunications and technology link among public college and university campuses and school districts through the use of computer and communications technology;

the facilitation of the implementation of a statewide professional development plan for teachers, principals, and superintendents using distance learning in coordination with the commissioner of education; and,
the increased involvement of parents, guardians, mentors or other volunteers with their studentsâ€™ education by utilization of distance learning.
